title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with pasta. Season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery, spiced tomato sauce.
instructions: Grill chicken. Cook onion and spices. Add tomato paste and cream. Mix chicken in sauce.
